translation.de: Ich muss mich an die Strategie für 800 halten,

translation.en: but this time do better, because this is for the team.
translation.de: aber diesmal besser sein, jetzt geht es ums Team.

translation.en: I'm gonna do good.
[Coach Jean] Listen to me carefully,
we came here to win.
translation.de: wir sind hier, um zu siegen.

translation.en: Even if you're in second, don't panic,
translation.de: Keine Panik, wenn ihr an zweiter Stelle seid,

translation.en: just go smooth until you catch up, but catch up. [chuckles]
translation.de: einfach ruhig weiterlaufen, bis ihr aufholt, aber holt auf.

translation.en: Because there's always somebody coming behind you.
translation.de: Denn es ist immer jemand hinter euch.

translation.en: [announcer] So Swift Athletics coming up on the exchange.
Oh, I'm nervous. It's a relay. They have some good competition in this.
translation.de: Ich bin nervös. Ein Staffellauf. Da gibt es gute Gegner.

translation.en: [Coach Jean] Track and field is not a team sport.
Even though you're on a team, when you get on the track,
you get on by yourself and you have to do the work.
translation.de: ist man auf der Bahn allein und muss es selbst schaffen.

translation.en: You have to get beyond the hurdles that are put before you.
translation.de: Man muss die Hindernisse vor einem überwinden.

translation.en: So it makes you strong in spirit
and that will get them far in life.
translation.de: und das wird sie im Leben weit bringen.

translation.en: [announcer] On your marks.
-[starting shot fires] -[Coach Jean] Get out, Chioma! Come on, Chioma!
That's good!
Go hard! Head down!
Keep your head down!
That's good!
Come on, Maya!
Go, Maya! Hard!
-That's good. -Good. That's good. Good, Tai, good!
translation.de: -Gut so. -Gut. Das ist gut. Gut so, Tai!

translation.en: Come on, Tai!
[Coach Karel] That's good!
Come on, Rainny!
Let's get 'em! Let's get 'em!
Yeah, she's running.
Come on, Rainn!
Let's get 'em!
[presenter] And our gold medal winners with a time of 9:39.06, Jeuness Track Club.
translation.de: Gold für den Jeuness Track Club mit einer Zeit von 9:39.06.

translation.en: -Yay! -[all cheering]
[Coach Jean] They've accomplished so much.
They're such tremendous athletes, and they don't even realize it yet.
translation.de: Sie sind hervorragende Athletinnen und wissen es noch gar nicht.

translation.en: It's going to be a long time before they even process everything that's happened.
translation.de: Es wird noch lange dauern, bis sie alles verarbeitet haben.

translation.en: You just have to hold your breath and pray that they stay on the right track.
translation.de: Man muss die Luft anhalten und hoffen, sie bleiben auf dem rechten Pfad.

translation.en: [Tai] Today is September 3rd, 2019.
Today is an important day.
Because it's the day before school.
translation.de: Denn morgen geht die Schule los.

translation.en: And today is when you get to get your hair done,
translation.de: NEUNTKLÄSSLERIN Heute kann man sich die Haare richten

translation.en: and most importantly get mentally prepared to say goodbye to having fun.
translation.de: und sich mental darauf vorbereiten, dass der Ernst des Lebens anfängt.

translation.en: I'm just nervous.
I hope that the kids are nice at school, 'cause I'm going to a private school.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, die Kinder sind nett, denn ich gehe auf eine Privatschule.

translation.en: I don't know. I'm not really rich either.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Reich bin ich nicht.

translation.en: Maybe I don't look cool enough.
Today I'm very… nervous.
I don't really want to go to high school.
translation.de: Ich will nicht auf die Highschool.

translation.en: I mean, I'd like to go back to middle school.
translation.de: Ich will zurück auf die Mittelschule.

translation.en: Not only 'cause, like…
Mostly because…
I don't like change all that much.
Change is different,
and I don't know how I'll react to change.
translation.de: und ich weiß nicht, wie ich darauf reagiere.

translation.en: So, Rainn, it's the day before school.
translation.de: Rainn, morgen geht die Schule los.

translation.en: [Rainn] Oh, no duh.
-How are you feeling? -Great.
Just like any other day.
-Not nervous? -Nope.
What are you looking forward to for the school year?
translation.de: Worauf freust du dich im neuen Schuljahr?

translation.en: Um, I'm looking forward to… peace and love.
translation.de: Ich freue mich auf… Frieden und Liebe.

translation.en: Okay, will that be all?
[Coach Jean] Tell your mother to take a picture of you and Rainn in your uniform.
translation.de: Deine Mom soll dich und Rainn in Uniform fotografieren.

translation.en: I need a picture in the morning.
translation.de: Ich brauche morgen früh ein Foto.

translation.en: Okay.
[Coach Jean] Yeah. So I can see you.
translation.de: Ja. Damit ich euch sehen kann.

translation.en: Yeah, let's keep up the good work, 'cause…
I just want you to remember, when you're in school,
before you say something, do something, just think to yourself,
translation.de: SIEBTKLÄSSLERIN bevor du etwas sagst oder tust, überlege:

translation.en: "Would I do this if Jean was standing next to me?"
translation.de: "Würde ich das tun, wenn Jean neben mir stünde?

translation.en: [Coach Jean] "Would I say this if Jean was standing next to me?"
translation.de: Würde ich das sagen, wenn Jean neben mir stünde?"

translation.en: [Tai chuckles] No.
[Coach Jean] Just say that to yourself, and then you'll be fine.
translation.de: Frag dich das, dann klappt es schon.

translation.en: I will.
Tai? Tai?
What time you leaving?
Okay, 7:15 is good.
Rainny, what time are you leaving?
[Tonia] Going through what they went through,
like losing their home, their bedroom,
translation.de: ihr Heim zu verlieren, ihre Zuflucht,

translation.en: having to live in a shelter,
then all of a sudden becoming these, like, track stars…
translation.de: und dann plötzlich quasi zu Leichtathletikstars zu werden…

translation.en: I think this whole thing just made them more aware of life.
translation.de: Ich glaube, das hat ihnen das Leben bewusster gemacht.

translation.en: They're wonderful, and they're still lovable and loving.
translation.de: Sie sind wunderbar. Sie sind noch immer liebenswert und liebevoll.

translation.en: They're, like, just beautiful young ladies.
Little women.
I would describe Tai, Rainn and Brooke as little women.
translation.de: Für mich sind Tai, Rainn und Brooke kleine Frauen.

translation.en: [Coach Jean] They always had that talent deep inside of them,
translation.de: Das Talent schlummerte immer in ihnen,

translation.en: but they needed someone to show them how to use that talent.
translation.de: aber jemand musste ihnen zeigen, wie man es nutzt.

translation.en: And that's what I'm there for.
Bye!
Bye.
As long as they find something that they love, and they work hard at,
translation.de: Solange sie etwas finden, das sie lieben und wofür sie hart arbeiten,

translation.en: that's all I can ask.
And now this is the age of the women,
translation.de: Das ist das Zeitalter der Frau,

translation.en: so they're really powerful women…
-[whistling] -…and that will take them far.
translation.de: und das wird sie weit bringen.

translation.en: [Tai] In your time of need,
just know you're not alone…
translation.de: nicht allein seid in der Not…

translation.en: because there's always someone there to help you.
translation.de: Es gibt immer jemanden, der hilft.

translation.en: Family, friends, people you don't know.
They'll help you along the way.
Then you also have to remember you have to work hard yourself…
translation.de: Vergesst nicht, dass ihr auch hart arbeiten müsst,

translation.en: because this is going to be your future,
translation.de: denn es geht um eure Zukunft.

translation.en: and you should make it your own.
So then… I think you have a pretty good life.
translation.de: Und dann… werdet ihr ein ziemlich gutes Leben haben.
